original_title: Walt Disney Cartoon Classics: The Goofy World of Sports
overview: Sports were never this funny! When Goofy shows off his athletic skills in "The Olympic Champ," he wins a gold medal for comedy! Then you'll quack up at the sporting antics of the world's most lovable duck in "Donald's Golf Game." Goofy has his skis and the laughs flying at top speed in "The Art of Skiing." Finally, Goofy goes from the slopes to boatsâ€”as the greatest daredevil water skier alive in "Aquamania!" So sit back, relax, and enjoy a front row seat for The Goofy World of Sports!
title: Walt Disney Cartoon Classics: The Goofy World of Sports
